subject_information.address: 230 Tiffany Mountain Suite 863, South Michael, KY 25205

suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer CUST_0062, an operational investment banker, exhibited high-value transactions with significant inflows but no outflows. Notably, multiple wire transfers and a substantial incoming wire transfer were observed, raising suspicion of money laundering. Transactions occurred frequently from 2025-02-03 to 2025-08-01, with amounts ranging from $13.00 to $98,090.16.
